channel.title: Autotest on Yougg's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Autotest on Yougg's Blog

item.title: Ubuntu18.04安装使用RIDE
item.description: Ubuntu 18.04 install Robot Framework RIDE set pip install source Linux/Unix ~/.pip/pip.conf Windows C:\Users\用户名\pip\pip.ini [global] trusted-host=rnd-mirrors.huawei.com index-url=http://rnd-mirrors.huawei.com/pypi/simple/ latest version install python pip apt install -y python3-pip install wxPython (for linux) pip install -U -f https://extras.wxpython.org/wxPython4/extras/linux/gtk3/ubuntu-18.04 wxPython install RIDE (for windows, only this step need) pip install -U
